meanings.definition: A popular trend in clothing and accessories.
meanings.sent1: The latest fashion includes bright colors and bold patterns.
meanings.sent2: She always follows the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone showed up in 80s fashion for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her style was a unique fashion statement that turned heads.
meanings.sent5: The fashion show displayed elegant designs that left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: To make or shape something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: She used clay to fashion a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: He likes to fashion wood into intricate sculptures.
meanings.sent3: Trying to fashion a cake without a recipe led to a messy disaster.
meanings.sent4: She managed to fashion a makeshift shelter out of branches and leaves.
meanings.sent5: The artist can fashion ordinary materials into extraordinary works of art.

meanings.definition: To behave in a way that is considered socially acceptable or desirable.
meanings.sent1: He tried to fashion himself as a gentleman in front of her parents.
meanings.sent2: She always fashions her manners to be polite and respectful.
meanings.sent3: In an attempt to impress, he fashions a grand entrance but trips and falls.
meanings.sent4: She fashions her speech to be persuasive and engaging.
meanings.sent5: The actor fashions his performances to captivate the audience.
